name: Whether You Call Me a Guardian Dragon or Not, Im Going to Sleep
summary: The story of a human reincarnated as the Creator God of a new world, and her observation logs of the burgeoning new world and life.Dragons, which have existed since before the birth of human civilization, became the guardian dragons of the empire.But whether you guys call me that or not, Im going to sleep.
author: Astartes
